title: The GVHD community is speaking. What have we learned? [Promoted Content]
summary_full: Chronic graft-versus-host disease (GVHD) affects up to one in two people who undergo a stem cell transplant. Patient advocacy groups are showing us where care systems fall short and what needs to change.
summary_public: Chronic graft-versus-host disease (GVHD) affects up to one in two people who undergo a stem cell transplant. Patient advocacy groups are showing us where care systems fall short and what needs to change.
